body:
Comment 1: 
Yep, that seems bad.

Pasting in the attachment:

package main

import "fmt"

var a, b, c = foo();

func main()     {
        fmt.Println(a, b, c)
}

func foo() (int, int, int) {
        fmt.Println("foo");
        return 1, 2, 3;
}
_Labels changed: added **compilerbug**._ _Status changed to **Accepted**._
